commandDescription: Add fields from your current branch to your permission sets
permissionSetDescription: Comma seperated list of Permission Set names
addEverythingDescription: Add every field to permission set, not just current branch
permsetpathDescription: The path to your Permission Set metadata
objectPathDescription: The path to your Object metadata
longFieldConfirm:
These fields:
%s
 will be added to %s, both read and write.
 Ok? (y/n)
shortFieldConfirm:
%s fields will be added to %s (both read and write).
 Ok? (y/n)
errorCheckoutABranch: Checkout a branch (other than '%s') or use --addeverything
errorPermissionMismatch: Permission mismatch. If --readpermission is 'false' then --editpermission cannot be 'true'
